Description: Implement product hierarchy for electronics (Smartphones, Laptops, Tablets, Accessories, Wearables). Create abstract Product base class, implement ProductType enum, create specific product classes, add category-specific attributes, update database schema with inheritance (TPH or TPT), create migrations, update Product Service API, add category filtering endpoints.

Implement product variants (color, storage, RAM) using Builder pattern. Create ProductVariant entity, implement ProductBuilder, add SKU generation, support variant-specific pricing and stock, create variant management API, add frontend variant selector UI.

Implement multiple pricing strategies (Regular, Sale, Bundle, Seasonal). Create IPricingStrategy interface, implement concrete strategies, add PriceCalculator service, support time-based pricing, create pricing rules engine, add admin API for price management.

Flexible attribute system for different product types. Create ProductAttribute entity with key-value pairs, support typed attributes, create attribute groups, add attribute search/filter capability, create attribute management API.

Multi-image support with primary image selection. Create ProductImage entity, support multiple images per product, implement image upload API, add image storage (local/blob), support image ordering, create thumbnail generation, add image gallery frontend component.

Advanced search with filters, sorting, pagination. Implement full-text search, add filter by category/price/brand, add filter by attributes, implement sorting options, add pagination, create search suggestions/autocomplete, optimize database queries with indexes.

Advanced inventory tracking with low-stock alerts. Add low-stock threshold configuration, implement stock level alerts using Observer Pattern, create inventory history tracking, add reorder point calculation, create inventory reports API, add admin inventory dashboard.

Customer reviews with ratings and moderation. Create Review entity, allow only verified buyers to review, support 1-5 star ratings, add review text with validation, calculate average rating per product, implement review pagination, add review reporting/moderation.

User wishlist with price tracking. Create Wishlist entity, add/remove products from wishlist, track price changes for wishlist items, send price drop notifications using Observer Pattern, add wishlist page UI, support sharing wishlists.

Side-by-side product comparison. Select up to 4 products to compare, display all attributes side-by-side, highlight differences, support comparison within same category, add comparison page UI with responsive mobile view.

Implement proper order lifecycle with state transitions using State Pattern. Define order states (Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled, Refunded), create state transition rules, add state change validation, create order history tracking, add state change notifications.

Multi-step order validation using Chain of Responsibility. Validate stock availability, user wallet balance, product availability, address completeness, order total. Return detailed validation errors. Chain validators in pipeline.

Complete cancellation with automatic refund. Allow cancellation in specific states, implement automatic stock restoration, process automatic wallet refund, send cancellation email, add cancellation reason tracking, update order history with compensation transactions.

Allow order modifications before shipping. Allow quantity changes, allow item removal, recalculate totals, process payment difference, validate stock for changes, update order history, restrict modifications after shipping.

Implement Saga pattern for order creation reliability. Create orchestrator for order creation, define compensation actions for each step, implement rollback mechanisms, add saga state persistence, handle partial failures gracefully, add comprehensive logging and distributed tracing.

Generate PDF invoices for orders. Generate invoice on order completion, include all order details, add tax calculation, support invoice download, store invoices persistently, send invoice via email using QuestPDF or similar library.

Support wallet, credit card, UPI, net banking using Adapter Pattern. Create IPaymentGateway interface, implement WalletPaymentGateway, implement mock CreditCardGateway and UPIGateway, add payment method selection UI, store payment method preferences, add payment retry mechanism.

Simplify complex checkout process with Facade Pattern. Create CheckoutFacade to encapsulate multi-step checkout, provide simple API for frontend, handle all service coordination, add checkout session management with timeout handling.

Robust payment failure handling with retry using Polly. Implement exponential backoff retry, add maximum retry limit, handle timeout scenarios, provide clear error messages, allow manual retry from UI, log all payment attempts, add circuit breaker pattern.

Coupon code system with various discount types. Create Coupon entity, support percentage and fixed discounts, add minimum order value rules, support expiry dates, add usage limit per coupon and per user, apply coupon at checkout, display discount breakdown.

Replace axios calls with React Query for server state. Install and configure React Query, create query hooks for all APIs, implement automatic caching, add optimistic updates, implement pagination with useInfiniteQuery, add error retry logic, configure stale time per query.

Replace Context API with Zustand for global state. Install Zustand, create stores (auth, cart, UI), implement persist middleware, add devtools integration, migrate from Context API, ensure type-safe store access.

PBI Title: Form Management with React Hook Form
Description: Replace controlled forms with React Hook Form. Install React Hook Form + Zod, create validation schemas, migrate all forms (login, register, checkout, profile), add field-level validation, implement form error display, add loading states.

Optimize bundle size with code splitting. Implement route-based code splitting, add React.lazy for heavy components, configure Suspense boundaries, add loading fallbacks, analyze bundle size, achieve <100KB initial bundle.

Convert to installable PWA with offline support. Add service worker using Workbox, create manifest.json, implement offline page, add install prompt, cache static assets, support offline browsing, pass Lighthouse PWA audit.

WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Add ARIA labels to all interactive elements, implement keyboard navigation, add focus management, support screen readers, add skip links, ensure color contrast ratios, pass axe-core audit.

Smooth animations with Framer Motion. Add page transitions, animate cart add/remove, add loading skeletons, implement smooth scrolling, add hover effects, optimize animation performance for mobile devices.

Comprehensive error handling UI. Create error boundary components, add fallback UI for errors, implement error logging, add retry mechanisms, display user-friendly messages, add error reporting integration point (Sentry).

Document components with Storybook. Set up Storybook, create stories for all components, add component documentation using MDX, implement design tokens, add interaction testing, deploy Storybook to static hosting.

Achieve 90+ Lighthouse score. Optimize images (WebP, lazy loading), minimize bundle size, implement virtualization for long lists, add memoization where needed (React.memo, useMemo, useCallback), reduce CLS and FID, pass Lighthouse audit.

Comprehensive unit tests for all services. Achieve >80% code coverage for business logic, test all service methods, test all validators, test all repositories, mock external dependencies using Moq, use xUnit + FluentAssertions, configure Coverlet for coverage.

Integration tests with real database. Test API endpoints end-to-end, use TestContainers for SQL Server, test service-to-service communication, test database transactions, test error scenarios, use WebApplicationFactory for in-memory API testing.

Unit tests for React components and hooks. Achieve >80% code coverage for components, test all custom hooks, test utility functions, use React Testing Library, mock API calls with MSW, generate coverage reports.
End-to-end user journey tests. Test complete user registration, test login flow, test product browsing, test checkout flow, test order history, run in CI pipeline, add visual regression testing.

Automated build and test on every commit. Build all .NET services, run all unit tests, run all integration tests, build frontend, run frontend tests, upload coverage reports to Codecov, fail on test failures, run on PR and main branch.

Build and push Docker images. Build images for all services, push to Docker Hub or GitHub Container Registry, tag with version numbers, optimize image sizes with multi-stage builds, scan for vulnerabilities using Trivy.
Automatic version bumping and changelog. Follow conventional commits, auto-generate version numbers, create GitHub releases, generate CHANGELOG.md, tag commits with versions using semantic-release.

Automated code quality checks. Run SonarQube analysis, check code smells, check duplications, check security vulnerabilities, fail build on quality gate failure, display quality badge. Set up SonarQube (self-hosted or cloud).

Automated vulnerability scanning. Scan .NET dependencies, scan npm dependencies, report vulnerabilities, fail on high/critical vulnerabilities, auto-create PRs for updates. Integrate Mend Bolt or Snyk.

Automated deployment to staging environment. Deploy on merge to main, deploy to staging environment (cloud or local K8s), run smoke tests post-deploy, send deployment notifications to Slack/email, configure rollback mechanism.
Set up local K3s cluster. Install K3s on local machine or VM, configure kubectl, set up namespaces (dev, staging, prod), configure RBAC, set up storage classes, test cluster connectivity.

Create K8s manifests for all services. Create Deployments for all services, create Services for all services, configure resource limits (CPU, memory), add liveness and readiness probes, configure environment variables, add ConfigMaps and Secrets.

Package application as Helm chart. Create Helm chart structure, parameterize all configurations, support multiple environments (dev/staging/prod), add deployment hooks, create values files for each environment, test chart installation and upgrades.

Set up ingress controller and routing. Install NGINX Ingress Controller, configure ingress routes, set up TLS/SSL with cert-manager, configure path-based routing, add rate limiting, test external access.
Configure persistent volumes for database. Create PersistentVolume, create PersistentVolumeClaim, mount to SQL Server pod, test data persistence across pod restarts, configure backup strategy.

Externalize configuration. Create ConfigMaps for all configs, create Secrets for sensitive data, mount as environment variables, support config hot-reload, encrypt secrets at rest, document secret rotation procedures.

Auto-scale pods based on load. Install metrics-server, configure HPA for services, set CPU/memory targets, test scale-up scenarios with load testing (k6 or JMeter), test scale-down scenarios, monitor scaling events.

Add Istio for advanced traffic management. Install Istio, enable sidecar injection, configure traffic routing with VirtualServices, add retry policies, add circuit breakers, configure mutual TLS, test traffic splitting, monitor with Kiali.
Automated deployment from Git. Install ArgoCD, connect to Git repository, configure auto-sync, deploy application via ArgoCD, test automated updates when Git changes, set up notifications.

Add comprehensive logging to all services. Integrate Serilog in all services, log to console and file, add structured logging with properties, include correlation IDs for request tracing, configure log levels per environment, add sensitive data masking.

Aggregate logs from all services. Deploy Loki to K8s, configure Promtail DaemonSet for log collection, send logs from all pods to Loki, create log dashboards in Grafana, add log search and filtering with LogQL, set up log alerts.

Collect metrics from all services. Deploy Prometheus to K8s, expose /metrics endpoints in all services using prometheus-net, configure Prometheus scraping with ServiceMonitors, collect custom business metrics (orders, revenue), set up service discovery, configure retention policies.

Create comprehensive dashboards. Deploy Grafana to K8s, connect to Prometheus data source, create dashboard for each service, display request rates/errors/latency (RED metrics), show resource usage (CPU, memory), add business metrics, support dashboard as code (version dashboards).

Trace requests across microservices. Deploy Jaeger to K8s, integrate OpenTelemetry in all services, trace service-to-service calls, include database queries in traces, add custom spans for key operations, visualize traces in Jaeger UI, correlate with logs using trace IDs.

Email and in-app notifications. Create NotificationService, support email notifications via SendGrid/SMTP, send order confirmation emails, send shipping update emails, add in-app notification center, support notification preferences, add notification queue (RabbitMQ or Azure Service Bus).

Product recommendations based on behavior. Recommend 'Customers also bought', recommend 'Frequently bought together', recommend based on browsing history, recommend based on category, display on product and home pages. Implement basic collaborative filtering.

Admin portal for management. Display sales analytics, display order statistics, display inventory alerts, manage products (CRUD), manage users, manage coupons, view system health. Create admin frontend (React Admin or custom) with role-based access control.

Full-text search with Elasticsearch. Deploy Elasticsearch, integrate NEST client, index products in Elasticsearch on creation/update, support fuzzy search, add search suggestions, support faceted search, highlight search terms, track search analytics.

Real-time order updates and notifications. Install SignalR, create notification hub, integrate in services to push updates, add frontend SignalR client, send real-time order status updates, show live inventory updates, display live notifications, support admin live dashboard.

Implement multi-level caching. Deploy Redis to K8s, install StackExchange.Redis, cache product catalog, cache user profiles, implement cache-aside pattern, add cache invalidation logic, configure TTL per data type, monitor cache hit rates.

Protect APIs from abuse. Add rate limiting to API Gateway using AspNetCoreRateLimit, configure per-user limits, configure per-IP limits, return 429 status code when limit exceeded, add rate limit headers to responses, allow admin exemptions.
Add security headers. Add Content-Security-Policy, add X-Frame-Options, add X-Content-Type-Options, add HSTS header, configure CORS properly, test with security scanners (Mozilla Observatory).

Protect against injection attacks. Validate all input with FluentValidation in all DTOs, sanitize HTML input, add request size limits, add validation tests, prevent SQL injection with parameterized queries, prevent XSS attacks, run security scan.

Secure secrets storage. Deploy HashiCorp Vault (or use Azure Key Vault), store all secrets in Vault, rotate secrets periodically, audit secret access, inject secrets into K8s pods using Vault Agent or CSI driver, document secret management procedures.

Security assessment and fixes. Run OWASP ZAP automated scan, run OWASP Dependency-Check, fix all high/critical vulnerabilities, document security posture, create security checklist, re-scan and verify fixes.
